person.headline: Combining development proficiency with Data Science & UX Research: A developer's journey to human-centered solutions
person.location: Marietta, Georgia, United States of America
person.summary: I am in the process of transitioning over 20 years of IT Development experience along with a BS in Psychology and MS in Data Science to a career as a UX Researcher.  I recently completed UX Research certification at Interaction Design Foundation and a UX/UI Foundations program at Designlab.  I have a passion for the User Experience and want to use my professional experience and educational background to facilitate the creation of better products, solutions and designs.

positionHistory.title: Principal AEM Expert Solutions Consultant
positionHistory.description:
Lead and analyze discovery sessions with users and client stakeholders to understand their use cases, system requirements and pain points. Present findings to users, executive stakeholders, and Adobe’s product team.

Work with product team to prioritize development of new product features and enhancements based on customer feedback, discovery sessions and customer interviews.
Use of personalization tools to setup and conduct online A/B tests and rule-based targeting for applications and web sites.

Develop and present multi-solution architecture implementation plans to users and stakeholders that include Adobe Experience Cloud solutions - AEM (Sites, Assets and Forms), Adobe Target, and Adobe Analytics.

Architect and Develop Integrations between Marketing Cloud Solutions using Power Automate, Workfront Fusion and Adobe App Builder.

positionHistory.title: Technical Architect
positionHistory.description:
Conduct in depth discovery sessions with users, subject matter experts and technical teams to understand user and systems requirements from a deeper technical prospective.  

Management of large scale projects with multiple developer resources.

Managed team of developers to successfully delivery multi-million-dollar AEM Sites and Forms conversion project.

Development of custom JAVA components and OSGI
Bundles to extend the functionality of AEM forms and Sites

Write technical requirements documents based on discovery sessions, business and functional requirements that outline technical steps required to develop a system with the desired functionality and behaviors to satisfy user requirements and use cases.
Work with users and subject matter experts to further define and clarify user stories.  
Conduct Scrum Sprint Planning sessions with development team.  
Work with Q/A to plan and coordinate UAT testing.

Architected and developed San Francisco property tax portal referenced here: http://www.govtech.com/civic/SF-
Tax-Portal-Nets-Unprecedented-Filings.html

positionHistory.title: Senior Software Engineer • Independent
positionHistory.description:
Development of custom applications using AEM, JAVA, HTML, Oracle, and other development technologies.
Managed development teams to successfully delivery multi-solution applications. 
Create and deliver architecture and integration diagrams.  Development of solution design documents and development plans.

Managed team of 8 Adobe AEM Form developers to successfully deliver over 200 paper forms to digital/dynamic web forms during a 6 month period.

Developed web based online systems to replace Mainframe applications. J2EE development using Struts
framework, WebSphere Application Server, and Adabas Mainframe System. Interfaced with
Natural/Adabas programs via Shadow Direct data broker, to send and receive data from the current
Mainframe system.

Redesign and development of previous Data-Planet website using JAVA and JSP. Performed updates to
existing site and developed additional functionality for payment and article management systems.

JSP and XML development utilizing JSTL tag library and JSP scripts, on JBoss Application Server. CMS
development using Rhythmyx. Developed complex SQL statements and stored procedures in Oracle
PL/SQL for applications Data Access Layer.

Architected, Designed and Developed Document Generation application to replace Natural Adabas application that generated Client Notices for Louisianan Department of Children and Family Services. The project was developed to retire Software AG's CON-FORM application, which is currently responsible for the formatting and creation of automated notices.

positionHistory.title: Technical Consultant
positionHistory.description:
Performed full life cycle development including requirements analysis, functional and technical design,
development, JAD facilitation, testing, and implementation for Health Services Organizations. Implemented and developed Health Provider Portals, Consumer Portals, Group Enrollment Portals and Defined Contribution Strategies.


Developed Group Enrollment Application for BCBS of Florida. Performed technical design and requirements analysis and insured business requirements complied with HIPAA. Led group of developers in JAVA data load and extraction utilities for DB2 Universal database. Functional requirements gathering utilizing RUP.

Developed an Insurance Claims processing Intranet Application including technical and functional design and requirements analysis. Used WebSphere Application Server and Visual Age for JAVA and JSP
development for J2EE compliant systems. Planned and estimated work for Credentialing Project.

educationHistory.schoolName: Georgia State University - J. Mack Robinson College of Business

recommendationHistory.caption: April 18, 2019, Matt managed Toni directly
recommendationHistory.description: Toni is not only technically strong with her AEM knowledge, but she also has the drive to continually learn and build upon her skills to keep up with new technology. Her passion for her work allows her to apply her expertise in a way that customers can truly realize the value of the products they are implementing. As a manager of the projects that Toni has worked on, I appreciate her capacity to think forwardly and question the strategy and reasoning behind the solutions we've implemented. I highly recommend Toni as an asset to any project team, as she is constantly thinking of ways to positively contribute.

recommendationHistory.caption: July 20, 2018, Darren worked with Toni on the same team
recommendationHistory.description: Toni is a very strong AEM developer, she brings expert development knowledge in AEM. Working on a development team with Toni she not only has the vision to forward think about new ideas, but helps other developers if they need help and always offers to contribute to the projects. I would recommend Toni on every AEM project because she’s focused on teamwork.

certificationHistory.name: Machine Learning Engineer with Microsoft Azure
Azure ML Studio - Data Science on Cloud
Microsoft Azure Data Scientist Associate (DP-100) Cert Prep: 1 Manage Azure Resources for Machine Learning
Introduction to Data Analysis with Pandas and NumPy
Programming for Data Science with Python

company.name: Adobe
company.tagline: Changing the world through digital experiences.
company.description: Adobe is the global leader in digital media and digital marketing solutions. Our creative, marketing and document solutions empower everyone – from emerging artists to global brands – to bring digital creations to life and deliver immersive, compelling experiences to the right person at the right moment for the best results. In short, Adobe is everywhere, and we’re changing the world through digital experiences.
